review: I used to have a couple of media streaming boxes (the early ones), including a Seagate, a Western Digital, and a Sony Bluray player that streamed. The first two didn't stream Amazon and the Blu-Ray player was slow and always buffering. My kid mentioned the Fire Stick, so I tried it out and absolutely love this thing. So far, no issues with buffering and load times are pretty quick. Only thing I wished is the ability to use Bluetooth headphones (hence the 4 instead of 5 stars). I would highly recommend this for people looking at streaming players to hook up to their TV.
author: Bui

review: I'm enjoying this purchase with one exception.  The audio is unpredicable and I'm uncertain if it's a TV issue or a Fire Stick issue.  I have to turn the volume to nearly the highest level to hear conversations.  If/when there are sound effects the volume changes and is blasting loud.  I'm not pleased about having to watch a movie with my remote in my hand to constantly adjust volume.
